com.escenic.domain.SingleSelectionProper.mDescription: A special configuration section for this story. If the value 'style1' is chosen, there has to be a configuration section of the form 'config.default.article.{sectionUniqueName}.type.{articleTypeName}.style1'. If you are not maintaining separate config root for content profile then it should be 'config.article.{sectionUniqueName}.type.{articleTypeName}.style1' .Note that the value of field 'customConfigSection' has higher priority over this field.

com.escenic.module.ModuleImpl.mContent: A special configuration section for this story. If the value 'style1' is chosen, there has to be a configuration section of the form 'config.default.article.{sectionUniqueName}.type.{articleTypeName}.style1'. If you are not maintaining separate config root for content profile then it should be 'config.article.{sectionUniqueName}.type.{articleTypeName}.style1' .Note that the value of field 'customConfigSection' has higher priority over this field.
